module.name: Info Services
module.description: Provides a number of applications accessible by feature codes: company directory, call trace (last call information), echo test, speaking clock, and speak current extension number.
module.changelog: *13.0.1.2* FREEPBX-15795 switch access-denied with invalid, press with vm-press *13.0.1.1* FREEPBX-14350 Info Services prompts replacements *13.0.1* FREEPBX-5116 Improved Speaking Clock *12.0.3.2* FREEPBX-7738 - Complete internationalization. *12.0.2* Use longer echo test as its language compatible, Allow people to exit out of the echo test by hitting keys *12.0.1* FREEPBX-7368 Use 5 second echo test intro *2.11.0.1* #6026 *2.11.0.0* #6021 *2.10.0.3* remove obsoleted directory feature code *2.10.0.2* #5115 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.0* #4653
